items.summary: Add backend-only PropertyStatus transition logic for listings with exactly these allowed transitions: #available → #visitCompleted, #visitCompleted → #underConfirmation, #underConfirmation → #bookedViaSTYO. Any other transition attempt must be rejected with an English error message.

Implement the 24-hour timeout rule for #underConfirmation: if a listing remains in #underConfirmation for more than 24 hours without being transitioned to #bookedViaSTYO, it must automatically revert to #available.
Enforce authorization rules for propertyStatus transitions so only the listing owner or an admin can advance the propertyStatus for that listing (auto-revert is system-driven).
